alert.note: Alert for Borden; Dawson; Howard; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 07 at 11:48PM CDT until June 08 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CDT THURSDAY FOR SOUTHERN BORDEN, SOUTHEASTERN DAWSON, HOWARD AND EASTERN MARTIN COUNTIES... At 1148 PM CDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Big Spring. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Big Spring, Ackerly, Coahoma, Forsan, Luther, Sand Springs, Lomax, Knott, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark, Vealmoor, Big Spring Country Club and Elbow. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
